actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported to House by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.  Report No: 99-19.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 268 - 133 (Record Vote No: 33).
Received in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent.
Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Commerce; Environment and Public Works by unanimous consent.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into S.991.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the Anadromous Fish Conservation Act during fiscal years 1986, 1987, and 1988.

summary.text: Extends through FY 1988 the authorization of appropriations for the Anadromous Fish Conservation Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the Anadromous Fish Conservation Act during fiscal years 1986, 1987, and 1988.
